title: How to Make a Hawaiian Gold Smoothie

steps.headline: Measure and pour the coconut cream, grapefruit juice, and pineapple juice in a blender.
Blend the ingredients for about 10-15 seconds or until smooth.
Add the ice to the blender.
Blend everything again until the mixture is smooth.
Use tall glasses to pour the drink into.
Stick a pineapple wedge on the side of each glass as a garnish.

text: Measure and pour the coconut cream, grapefruit juice, and pineapple juice in a blender.  Blend the ingredients for about 10-15 seconds or until smooth.  Add the ice to the blender.  Blend everything again until the mixture is smooth.  Use tall glasses to pour the drink into.  Stick a pineapple wedge on the side of each glass as a garnish.  Finished.
